## Events

| Event              | Description                                                           | Type                              |
| ------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------- |
| `closeDateModal`   | Emits `closeDateModal` event that `orion-date-input` can listen for   | `CustomEvent<any>`                |
| `selectModalDates` | Emits `selectModalDates` event that `orion-date-input` can listen for | `CustomEvent<{ dates: Date[]; }>` |
